96841.「ありがとう お兄ちゃん！\n すりむいたヒザ もう ぜんぜん痛くないよっ！:
Thanks so much! The scrape on my knee
feels much better now!

96842.「もう 転ばないように 気をつけるんだよ。\n ぼうや。: Be careful not to fall down again, pal.

96843.「うんっ！\n それじゃあ ボク 遊びに行ってくるね！\n ばいばーい！！: Okay! I'm gonna go play some more! Bye bye!

96844.「あら？ <pc>さん！\n 偶然 ここで会えて よかったわ。:
Huh? Oh, <pc>! It's great we
happened to run into you here.

96845.「いやー 探したぞ。<pc>！\n 最初の誘拐事件を 目撃したそうじゃないか。\:
Yeah, we've been looking for you, actually.
We heard you witnessed the kidnappings and
were hoping you could tell us more.

96846.「……えっ マイユを探しにきた？\n いったい何が あったんだ！？:
Huh? You came here looking for Maille? What's
going on out there?!

96847.<pc>は マイユたちに\nランガーオ村が襲われ 村王クリフゲーンが\n意識不明:
<pc> informed Maille and Arold
that Langao Village was attacked and Chief
Cliffgain is badly injured!

96848.「お父さんが そんな ひどいケガを……？: My dad got hurt that badly...?

96849.「待っていて お父さん！ \n 私 すぐ 帰るからっ！！: I'm coming, dad! Wait for me!

96850.「オレたちは ランガーオ村へ戻る。\n <pc>。伝言ありがとう！:
We're headed back to Langao. Thanks for
letting us know!

96852.「いかがでした マイユさま。\n お父さまのご様子は……。: Well? How is your father doing...?

96854.「長年 あちこちを放浪している間に \n オレは 医術の心得も 身につけたんだが:
While I've traveled around, I've picked up
some knowledge about medicine...

96855.「……正直 あのケガは ひどい。 \n キズが深すぎて 血が止まらないんだ。:
To be honest, it's not looking good. The wound
is very deep and the bleeding isn't
stopping...

96857.「私のせいよっ！\n もっと早く この村に 帰ってきていれば！！:
It's all my fault! If only I'd come back here
sooner...!!

96860.「過ぎたことは 仕方がない。\n 今は どうしたら 村王の身体を治せるか\n そ:
What's happened happened. For now, let's find
a way how we can heal the chief.

96862.「じつは ひとつ心当たりがあるんだ。 \n マイユ。<pc>。\n ちょっと オ:
Actually, I have an idea. You two, please hear
me out for a second.

96863.「以前 世界中を 放浪していたときに\n 珍しい薬草のうわさを 聞いたことがある:
I once heard rumors of a rare medicinal herb
when I was traveling the world.

96864.「人里はなれた山奥 深き雪の中に生える\n その薬草……いやしの雪中花は\n い:
Deep in the mountains far from civilization,
deep within the snow grows an herb... the
Soothing Snow Flower can heal any wound...

96865.「どこっ！？\n その薬草 どこにあるの！ 教えて！！: Where?! Where is that herb?! Tell me!!

96866.「落ち着け マイユ！ \n いやしの雪中花が 生えているのは\n はるか南の ラ:
Hey, take it easy! The herb grows far to the
south, near Landonfoot...

96867.「ランドンフットの 南西にある洞くつを抜けた\n ゴズ渓谷……その最深部にある:
Through a cave southwest of Landonfoot is a
place called Goz Valley. There's a big snow
pillar in the deepest part that has the herb.

96868.「わかったわ！ \n 私 採りにいってくる！！: I got it! I'll go get one right now!!

96870.「マイユのやつ 相当 頭に血がのぼっているな。 \n あの村王の 容態を見たら\:
That Maille... she's pretty hot-headed right
now. I can't blame her though, considering
her father's condition...

96871.「<pc>。\n ランドンフットの 南西まで\n マイユを 追いかけてくれないか:
I need you to follow Maille to the southwest
part of Landonfoot.

96872.「今のマイユを ひとりにするのは心配なんだ。\n それに ゴズ渓谷の魔物たちは:
I'm worried about her going all alone, since
the monsters in Goz Valley are pretty strong.
If something were to happen to her...

96873.「本当なら オレが ついていきたいところだが\n 今は 村王の看病に専念しなけれ:
Although I'd like to come, I have to stay here
and take care of the chief. You're my only
hope right now.

96874.「私からも お願いします。\n どうか マイユさまを 追いかけて\n いやしの雪:
Please, for all of us... please bring back
Maille and a Soothing Snow Flower!

96876.「村王！ すぐに行きます！！: The chief! I'll be right there!

96877.「頼んだぞ <pc>！\n マイユを追って ゴズ渓谷の 大雪柱へ向かい\n いや:
We're counting on you! Follow Maille into Goz
Valley and get one of those Soothing Snow
Flowers!

96878.「まあ <pc>さん！\n あなたも 来てくれたんですね。:
Oh, <pc>! I see you came here
too.

96879.「これが いやしの雪中花……。\n きれい……。:
So this is the Soothing Snow Flower...
How beautiful...

96880.「よかった……。この花があれば \n きっと 父さんの命は 助かるはず……。:
Thank goodness... this flower will surely save
dad's life...

96881.「ごめんなさい 泣いたりして。\n ずっと気持ちが 張り詰めてたから\n いやし:
Sorry for crying... I've been feeling quite
stressed for awhile now. Finding this flower
was like a huge weight off my chest.

96882.「父さんに もしものことがあったら\n どうしよう……って そのことばかり\n:
I kept thinking... what would I do with myself
if something happened to my dad...?

96883.「……じつはね <pc>さん。\n 私 村王クリフゲーンの\n 本当の娘では な:
Actually, <pc>... I am not
the chief's real daughter.

96884.「昔……私が 赤ん坊だった頃\n ランガーオ村の近くで 大きな火事が起きて\n:
A long time ago, when I was a baby, there was
a big fire near Langao. My biological parents
were...

96885.「燃え盛る炎の中 奇跡的に生き残った私を\n 父さんは命がけで救い出し……\n:
Somehow, I survived the fire when my dad
risked his life to save me... and knowing I
was all alone, he took me in.

96886.「当時 私は 小さかったから \n じつの両親の顔も なにひとつ覚えてないの。\:
I was so young that I don't even remember what
my parent's faces looked like. But I never
felt lonely.

96887.「だって いつだって 父さんが\n やさしい笑顔で 私を見守ってくれて……\n:
...because my father always looked out for me
with a kind smile... and was always there for
me, no matter what.

96888.「だから 村を出てからも 早く 一人前になって \n 父さんに 恩返しをしたいな:
That's why I wanted to prove myself after I
left the village... I wanted to be able to
repay his kindness.

96889.「父さん……。\n 私が 絶対に助けるからね。\n ランガーオ村に帰るまで 待っ:
Dad, I will save you... I promise. Please
wait for me.

96891.「さあ <pc>さん。\n 急いで ランガーオ村へ戻って\n いやしの雪中花を:
Come on. Let's hurry back to Langao and give
the flower to Arold!

96893.「<pc>！ 無事に帰ったのか。\n 今 マイユが持ってきてくれた\n いやしの:
Oh, you're back safe! I just made some
medicine out the flower Maille brought
back.

96894.「……これで 血が止まるはずだ。\n 村王 この薬を 飲んでください。:
This should stop the bleeding... Chief, please
drink this.

96895.アロルドは いやしの雪中花を煎じた薬を\n村王クリフゲーンに 飲ませた！:
Arold gave Chief Cliffgain medicine made from
the Soothing Snow Flower!

96900.「我が娘よ……\n 無事に 帰ってきてくれたのか……うっ。:
My daughter... you've come back safely...
Ugh...

96901.「いやしの雪中花のおかげで\n どうにか 血は止まりましたが\n あまり 無理を:
The bleeding has stopped thanks to the
medicine, but you still shouldn't push
yourself too hard.

96902.「むぅ……情けない。 \n アロルド。お前にも 世話になったようだな。:
Mm... how pathetic I must be. It seems I owe
you my thanks as well, Arold.

96903.「……マイユ。無事で 安心したぞ。: Maille, I'm so relieved you're safe...

96905.「……父さん。私が 旅に出ていた間に\n ランガーオ村に いったい何があったの？:
Dad... what happened to the village while I
was gone? Please tell me.

96906.「……そうだな。\n お前たちには 話しておかねばならんだろう。:
That's right... there is something I need to
tell all of you.

96907.「先日のことだ……。\n 突然 フードをかぶって 顔を隠した男が\n ドラゴンの:
Just the other day, a hooded man came out of
nowhere and led a group of dragons to attack
the village...

96908.「男は キズつき倒れた村人たちに \n 次々に 不気味なヘビを 近づけると\n:
He interrogated all of the wounded villagers
with some kind of snake, asking "Where is
the divine vessel?"

96909.「だが その 神の器とやらは\n 見つからなかったのか\n 男は ドラゴンととも:
However, he didn't find his so-called "divine
vessel", so he and his dragons left.

96910.「<pc>。あなたも\n 連続誘拐事件を 追っているんだろう。\n 知っているこ:
<pc>. I know you've been
following this string of kidnappings, too.
Please tell us everything you know!

96911.<pc>は これまでに起きた誘拐事件と\n巫女ヒメアから 聞いた話について\nみ:
<pc> explained to everyone about the
kidnappings that had taken place so far and
about what Himea had said!

96912.「やはり……わしの恐れた通りだったか。: As I thought... it's just as I feared.

96914.「……マイユ。お前は 生まれつき \n 火に強い子どもだったのだ。:
Maille... you were born with a natural
resistance to fire.

96915.「お前の じつの両親が死んだ \n あの 大火事の時も 燃え盛る家の中で\n お:
When your real parents died in that big fire,
you were the only one in that burning house
who suffered no burns at all.

96917.「ああ。わしは 大ヤケドを負ったが。\n ちいさいお前は ケロっとしたものだった:
Yes. I suffered from severe burns, but you
were completely unfazed! Gahahah!

96918.「マイユ。お前にそなわった \n 火をものともしない 不思議なチカラは\n オー:
Maille... your mysterious power to resist fire
must be a blessing from the god of the Ogres,
Gazbalan.

96919.「きっと……お前こそが \n ヤツの探している 神の器なのだ。:
Perhaps... you are the divine vessel that
man was searching for.

96920.「謎の男は 執拗に 村中を探していった。\n おそらく……マイユ お前を狙ってい:
That man searched the village relentlessly.
I believe... that you are without a doubt who
he is targeting.

96921.「だが 何度あやつらが 襲ってきたとしても \n 命に代えて お前だけは 守って:
But no matter how many times he attacks here,
I will protect you with my life!

96922.「無茶言わないでっ！！\n やっと 血が止まったところなのよっ！\n また キズ:
Don't be ridiculous! You've just stopped
bleeding! If your wounds were to reopen...

96923.「ふんっ これしきのケガ！\n 歴戦の戦士を 見くびるでないぞ マイユ。:
Hmph! It's just a little scratch! Don't
underestimate a seasoned warrior like me.

96924.「父さんの強さは 誰より信じてるわ。\n でも……これ以上 父さんに\n 迷惑を:
I believe in your strength more than anyone.
But...I don't want any more harm to come to
you...

96925.「これまで 育ててもらった恩返しも\n まだ できていないのに……。:
I haven't even been able to repay the kindness
that you've given me for all these years...

96927.「恩返しなど必要ないわ！\n 親子の間で 水くさいぞ マイユ。:
There's no need to repay anything! There
should be no worries like that between a
parent and a child.

96928.「……マイユ。まだ 子を持たぬお前には\n わからんかもしれんが\n お前の笑顔:
Maille... you may not understand it, but just
your smile alone has saved my life many times.

96929.「やり場のない怒りや 悲しみ……\n 苦い後悔で 胸が つぶれそうになる日も\n:
On days when I felt overwhelming anger,
sadness, or bitter regret... I'd always come
home to find you there for me.

96930.「愛する娘が 笑顔で迎えてくれることが\n どれほど わしの希望となったか。\n:
How much it meant to me that my beloved
daughter would greet me with a smile... I'm
happy to call you my daughter.

96932.「……なあ マイユ。お前は まだまだ子供だ。 \n 遠慮せずに 父を……周りを頼:
Hey, Maille... you're still a kid. Don't
forget that you can always rely on your dad...
and others around you.

96933.「そうだよ マイユ。村王や オレにとって\n キミは 命よりも大切な人なんだ。\:
That's right. You're more important to me and
the chief than life itself. We'll protect you,
no matter what!

96935.「この村王と アロルドがいれば 百人力！ \n 幸いなことに <pc>もいるのだ:
Arold and I have the strength of a hundred
men! We luckily have <pc>, too!
No matter our enemy, we'll be just fine!

96937.「……私 ちょっと 外の空気を 吸いたいな。\n すぐに戻るわね。: I need some air... I'll be right back.

96938.「マイユ ひとりじゃ危ない。 \n オレも行こう。:
It's not safe to go by yourself. I'll come
with you.

96939.「……突然 神の器だなどと言われ \n その上 村が襲われた原因が 自分だと知っ:
No wonder she's confused... she finds out
she's a divine vessel and the reason the
village was attacked.

96940.「<pc>。\n すまんが あのふたりを 追いかけてくれんか。: I hate to ask, but could you go follow them?

96941.「いつ あの男が襲ってくるかもわからん。 \n ヤツの強さは おそるべきもの……:
We have no idea when that man will attack
again. His strength is formidable, so we have
to be careful...

96942.「そして 万が一 ヤツらが襲ってきたなら \n その時は わしの娘を守ってくれ。:
And if he does attack, please protect my
daughter. I know you can!

96944.「私が 笑っていられたのは\n 父さんが いてくれたからなのに。\n 私に感謝す:
I only smile because of you... I should be
the one saying thank you, not you!

96945.「昔っから お前は 意地っ張りだったもんな。\n 泣きたくなると オレを連れて:
Always the stubborn one. Whenever you needed
to cry, you'd bring me here with you and
make me stand watch so no one would find us.

96946.「だって……あの場で 泣いたりしたら\n よけいに 父さんに心配かけるでしょっ！:
Because... if I cried back there, I'd have
worried him even more!!

96947.「……親にとっては いつまでも\n 子供は 子供なんだよ マイユ。:
Maille... for parents, their children will
always be children, no matter how old they
get.

96948.「心配するのも 親の仕事のうちさ。\n 村王の気持ちを 受け止めて 素直になれよ:
It's a parent's job to worry. Accept your
father's feelings and be honest. That's what
it means to prove yourself.

96950.「きゃっ <cs_pchero>さん！？\n いつから 聞いてたんですか……:
Ah, <pc>?! How long were you
listening...?

96952.「ドラゴンの群れが 村にっ！！: More dragons are attacking the village!

96953.「早く みんなを助けに行かなきゃ！！: Quick! We have to save everyone!!

96954.「ダメだ！\n ヤツらの狙いは お前なんだ。\n みすみす 危険に飛び込んでどう:
No, you can't! That man's after you. You'd
be throwing yourself into danger!

96955.「……幸い この武闘場に お前がいることは \n まだ 気づかれていないだろう。:
Luckily, I don't think they've realized that
you're here just yet. Let's hide here a while
and see what happens.

96957.「……<cs_pchero>！\n あなたも 村に飛来したドラゴンは見ただろう。:
<cs_pchero>! You saw the dragons
too, right? Please, go back into the village
and join the others!

96959.「どうか ランガーオ村のみんなを……\n 父さんを 守ってください！:
Please protect everyone in the village and my
dad!

96961.「そうか。ドラゴンたちは 村を荒らしたあと\n どこかへ 飛び去っていったのか。:
I see... so the dragons flew away after they
attacked the village. But who knows when
they'll attack again...

96962.「あれは……？\n 空の向こうから 何かが 近づいてくる……。:
What's that? Something's coming this way from
the sky....

96964.「空から ドラゴンの群れが！\n 再び 村を 襲いにきたというの！？:
There's dragons flying this way! Are they
attacking the village again?!

96966.「<cs_pchero>！\n すまないが もう一度 村へ戻って\n 魔物たちか:
I'm sorry, but I need you to go back to the
village and make sure everyone is safe from
those monsters!

96968.「どうか ランガーオ村のみんなを……\n 父さんを 守ってください！:
Please protect everyone in the village and my
dad!

96969.「……これで 村を襲ってきた魔物は\n すべて倒したはずだ。<cs_pchero:
That looks to be all the monsters that
attacked us... If it weren't for your help, we
would've been done for.

96970.「こっちも なんとか 片付けたぞ！ \n 今度こそ ランガーオ村を 守り切ったん:
We cleaned up over here, too! We were able to
protect the village this time!

96971.「よし！ 村王に 報告しに行こう。\n これだけ こてんぱんに してやれば\n:
Good! Let's report this to the chief. If we
beat them this badly, they shouldn't be able
to attack us anymore...

96973.「て……敵の首領の\n あの フードをかぶった男が……\n 武闘場へ……向かっ…:
T...their leader... that hooded man... he's...
he's headed for the arena...!

96975.「……我々も 必死に 戦ったが\n まるで 歯が立たず……。:
We did all that we could, but we were no
match for him...

96976.「村王……カタキを討てず…… \n 申し訳な……うっ……！:
Chief... I'm sorry... that we couldn't...
...beat him... uuggh...!

96978.「……ん？ どうした <cs_pchero>。\n そんなに慌てて。:
Huh...? What's wrong, <cs_pchero>?
What's the rush?

96979.「なにっ！？\n 武闘場には マイユさんがいるだとっ！！: What?! Maille is also in the arena?!

96980.「た 頼む……<cs_pchero>！\n すぐに 武闘場へ向かってくれ……。:
Please, <cs_pchero>...! Go to the
arena, quickly...

96981.「オレたちでは ヤツには 勝てん……。\n ……<cs_pchero>！\n ど:
We couldn't beat him... Please...
Please protect Maille...

96982.「お前が 村をドラゴンに襲わせたのか！\n 答えろっ！！:
Why did you order dragons to attack our
village?! Answer me!!

96983.「……先日 この村を訪れた時には \n 貴様ら いなかったな？:
You were not here the last time I
came to this place, were you...?

96984.「おい！ なんのつもりだ！？: Hey! What do you think you're doing?!

96985.「女。貴様か……。: I see... so it is this woman, is it...?

96987.「貴様こそが 我々が探し求めていた\n 神の器！！:
You are the divine vessel I've been searching
for!!

96988.「お前の相手は このオレだ！！: You'll have to get through me first!!

96991.「面倒だな……眠っているがいい。: How annoying.... just go to sleep.

96994.「来…る……な……\n ……マイユ。この霧……危険……。:
Don't... come... closer... that fog... is
dangerous...

96996.「さあ 神の器よ……\n 我らのもとへ 来てもらおうか。:
Now then, divine vessel...
You are coming with me.

96998.「父さんばかりか アロルドまで！\n 私は あなたを絶対に 許さないっ！！:
Not only my dad, but Arold, too?! I will never
forgive you!!

96999.「類まれなる その強さ……\n 貴様が 神の器に 間違いないようだな。:
What exceptional strength... you are indeed a
divine vessel.

97000.「……やるじゃない。\n 私の 父さんに \n 深手を負わせただけのことは ある:
Not bad... it's no wonder you hurt my dad as
much as you did...

97003.「今すぐ ランガーオ村から 出ていきなさい！\n さもないと……: Leave this village right now! Or else...

97004.「その顔……！\n あなた 魔物だったの……！？: Your face...! You're... you're a monster...?!

97006.「我々は この世界の歴史から\n 忘れ去られし種族……。:
We are a race forgotten from the history of
this world...

97010.「さすがは 神の器……。\n こうも 手こずらされるとはな。:
You truly are a divine vessel... I didn't
think I'd need to try so hard.

97011.「だが もはや 我が手中に落ちた。: However, you've now fallen into my hands.

97012.「……また 貴様か。 \n この姿を見られた以上\n もはや 決着をつけねばなる:
You, again...? Now that you've seen me like
this, we have to settle this here and now.

97014.「我が名は 竜将アンテロ。\n <cs_pchero>よ 我が手で 貴様に\n:
My name is Antelo, general of the dragons!
<cs_pchero>! You shall meet your end
by my hand!

97017.「さすがは 神の器……。\n あの攻撃を受けて なおも 動けるとはな。:
You are truly a divine vessel... to be able to
move after such an attack...

97018.「だが もはや 我が手中に落ちた。\n ……ん？:
However, you've now fallen into my hands.
...hm?

97020.「何度 ジャマしてもムダなことよ。 \n ……今度こそ つぶさせてもらう。:
It's futile to keep standing in my way. This
time, I'm going to crush you...

97021.「貴様……この私に 手キズを負わせるとは。: You... you dare to wound me...?

97022.「だが これしきで……\n 私を倒したと思ってもらっては 困るぞ。:
However... I cannot allow you to think that
you've beaten me here.

97024.「なっ……その異形の姿……\n 魔物かっ！？:
What..? That deformed figure... is that a
monster?!

97025.「いや その背格好には 見覚えがある。 \n 貴様！ 先日 村を襲った 白フード:
No, I remember now... You! You're
that hooded man who attacked our
village the other day, aren't you?!

97026.「あの時の借り 今日こそ 返させてもらうぞ。:
Today... I will pay you back what you so
rightly deserve!

97027.「……さすがに これほどの手練れに \n 囲まれては 分が悪いな。\n オーガの:
It wouldn't be wise for me to be surrounded by
such skilled adversaries... I will leave the
vessel in your care... for now.

97028.「……我ら 竜族の野望。 \n 必ず この手で 実現してみせる。:
The Nadravians' ambitions will surely by
realized by my own hands.

97029.「<cs_pchero>よ。 \n 次に会う時が 貴様の最期だっ！！:
<cs_pchero>... the next time we meet...
You shall meet your end!!

97030.「竜族だと……？ \n あの異形の姿と 恐ろしいまでの強さ。\n いったい 竜族:
Nadravian...? What a strange figure and
terrifying strength... what exactly are the
Nadravians...?

97031.「いや 今は マイユと アロルドが心配だ。:
But right now I need to focus on Maille and
Arold.

97386.「お前たちが 持ってきてくれた\n いやしの雪中花や 治癒の魔法でも\n アロル:
Even with the flower you found and some help
from recovery magic... Arold's poison still
lingers...

97387.「わしも 様々な魔物たちと\n 戦ってきたが こんな症状の毒は\n 見たことも:
I've also fought many kinds of monsters, but
I've never seen or heard of a poison with
symptoms like this.

97390.「アンテロとやらの居所を つきとめれば \n この毒を治す方法も わかるかもしれ:
If we can find that Antelo, maybe we can
somehow figure a way to cure this poison...

97393.「英雄 <pc>どの。\n ただちに グランゼドーラ城へ戻り\n 東の塔まで 足:
<pc>. Please return immediately
to Gran Zedora Castle and make your way to
the east tower!

97394.「グランゼドーラ城というと…… \n レンダーシアにあるという あの城か？:
Gran Zedora Castle... that castle in
Lendersia?

97395.「いかにも。シオン様から 急ぎ\n <pc>どのに おいでいただきたいと\n 伝:
Indeed. I have a message from Shion, who is
urgently requesting <pc>'s
immediate presence!

97396.「なんでも 相次ぐ 誘拐事件について\n 重大なことを <pc>どのに\n 直接:
He would like to speak with you directly so
that you may inform him of these recent
kidnappings!

97397.「……行け <pc>。\n お前のチカラが 必要とされているのだろう。\n あと:
...Go, <pc>. Your strength is
needed more there. Leave the rest here to me.

97398.「ええ。私は アロルドを看病するわ。 \n だから あなたは アンテロを追ってく:
Yeah. I'll take care of Arold. And please...
You have to find Antelo.

97399.「それでは 私は これにて失礼します！\n 英雄 <pc>どの。\n グランゼド:
Then I shall take my leave! Please make haste
to Gran Zedora Castle's east tower!

97400.「……おっと <pc>。\n グランゼドーラ城へ 出発する前に\n これを 受け:
Oops, before you go... I want you to have
this.

97401.「我が娘 マイユを守ってくれた礼だ。\n お前には 心から 感謝しているぞ。:
I thank you from the bottom of my heart for
protecting my daughter.

97404.「しかし グランゼドーラ城から\n じきじきに 呼び出しとは。\n まさに お前:
But to be summoned directly to Gran Zedora
Castle... that's quite something. You really are a
hero of Astoltia, aren't you?

97405.「では 達者でな <pc>！\n アロルドのことは まかせておけ。:
Good luck to you! We'll take care of Arold,
so don't you worry.

97406.「<pc>さん。\n あの 竜将アンテロという男には\n くれぐれも お気をつけ:
<pc>... please be careful with
that Antelo guy...

97408.「これまで あなたが 誘拐事件を追って\n 知ったこと そのすべてを……\n 私:
Now then...would you be so kind as to indulge
me with everything you've learned so far with
what's been going on?

97409.<pc>は シオンに\nこれまでの出来事を 話した！:
<pc> told Shion everything that
had happened so far!

97410.「……竜将アンテロ。\n ランガーオ村に現れた その男は\n 確かに 自らを 竜:
Antelo, general of dragons... that man who
appeared in Langao Village revealed himself
as a Nadravian, did he not?

97412.「……<pc>。\n あなたを ここへ呼んだのは\n 竜族という存在について 教:
I've called you here so that I may explain to
you the existence of the Nadravians.

97413.「この世界の歴史から 忘れ去られし 幻の種族 \n ……空の民 竜族。:
A race long forgotten from this world's
history... Nadravians, the people of the
sky...

97414.「ランガーオ村に現れた アンテロという者の姿は \n まさに 古来より伝えられし:
Antelo is of that very same race. Perhaps
you've heard of it before?

97415.「そう……あなたの古き友 シンイが\n 仮の宿りとした クロウズもまた\n アン:
That's right... your friend Shini's other
form, Claws, also identifies as Nadravian.

97416.「……この先は 私が語るよりも\n あなた自身の目で 確かめてくるほうがいい。:
Rather than tell you what will happen next...
I'd like you to see it for yourself.

97417.「<pc>。 \n この アストルティアには……竜族が住む\n 竜族の隠れ里とい:
Somewhere in Astoltia there is a place where
the Nadravians live... it is a hidden place,
known as the Nadravian's Rest.

97418.「飛竜に乗り モンセロ温泉峡の南にある\n 煙霧の谷へ降り立ち……\n 竜の描か:
Ride your dragon to the Misty Valley south of
Moncello Spring Gorge. When you see the dragon
mural, blow your flute in front of it.

97419.「そうすれば……\n 竜族の隠れ里への道が 開けるでしょう。:
After doing so, the way to the Nadravian's
Rest will reveal itself.

97420.「……さあ これを 持っていきなさい。\n これからの あなたの旅を助けるため\:
I'd like you to take this with you. It will
most certainly help you on your journey.

99135.「ギュラン！ ふたりを 家まで運ぶぞっ！！\n <cs_pchero>っ。\n:
Guran! Let's get these two back to the
village! <cs_pchero>, please come
with us!

102660.「悠久の時を経て 定められし 運命の時が\n アストルティアに 訪れようとしてい:
As foretold from long, long ago... Astoltia's fated moment will soon arrive. Everything that has happened so far is just a small piece
of something much bigger.

102662.「その 白き導き手を 持っていれば \n いかなる場所にいようとも\n 私からの:
With that Handy Horse, I am able to give you
advice no matter where you are.

102663.「さあ 行きなさい <pc>。\n 竜族の隠れ里を 訪れるのです。:
You must go, <pc>.
Find the Nadravian's Rest.

102664.「……真実に至るカギは そこにある。\n あなたなら きっと見つけられるでしょう:
The key to the truth is there. I have no doubt
you will find it.

117129.「あれは……？\n 空の向こうから 何かが 近づいてくる……。:
What's that? Something's coming this way from
the sky....

118084.「ただし……白き導き手が 声を伝えるのは\n 私の方から 呼びかけた時のみ。\n:
However... it will only speak when I first
call out to you. Try not to rely on it too
much...
